Are there any missions that need doing? Waterbe Space Operations (WSO) can gather any data from the Kerin and her moons that you could ever need*.

*Provided it is possible stock in the current version of KSP.

Are there any missions that need doing? Waterbe Space Operations (WSO) can gather any data from the Kerin and her moons that you could ever need*.

*Provided it is possible stock in the current version of KSP.

Actually, no, we are going in an order. If you join, I can see if I can squeeze you in for Minmus.

Yes. I added you on the list.

Sorry for some delay on the Mun topographical map, but I was deciding some stuff on my server.

Edited July 4, 2021 by benjiful9000

Here, this is a sample flag if [bioman's company] would do a topographical scan of Minmus.

If you want changes, or don't want to use it, thats ok, it's fine, its just a sample, as in, its not an actual mission flag, just a sample or a place holder. But if you want to use it, its the default flag size and resolution.

fixed image link

Potato Astronautics would like to join this

Edit: What missions can I do?

Edited July 2, 2013 by tygoo7

Hey everyone,

As the thread instructed us to alert ISSO if we had any current scientific missions, I wanted to share a strange finding I found about the oceans of Kerbin. The density was found to be much lower than that of water, let alone salt water, leading to questions as to whether or not Kerbin's oceans are actually made of water. You can view the report HERE.

EDIT: Also, thanks to ISSO and Kerman Corp for the data they made available regarding the average temperature of Kerbin.

Edited July 2, 2013 by Ben 9072
Kerman Corp also helped too. '-'
Sorry, I misread the data on who did what. I actually only used the Kerman Corp data, not the KAAST. XD

Lol? The Mun map is almost done

Bio, we should have an website to store these data.

Here it is. Sorry if I couldn't finish the Poles (the black dot in the middle). I am new to mapping so, I think this will help ISSO alot.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Thanks for doing that assignment, Rocky!

I'll peform my magic (by which I mean dragging the maps off the window) and put the maps up momentarily.

Perculiar initial temperature measurements on Mun. Nightime (in the dark) temperature 000.00, daytime (in full light) temperature 000.00.

Either there is a flaw in the measurement instruments or something very strange is happening on the Mun. More probes will touch down on the Mun to confirm the initial results.

Edited July 2, 2013 by TheCardinal

If someone needs a banner I could make them one, but they should at least have their company name/ abbreviation in their sig.

Either there is a flaw in the measument instruments or something very strange is happening on the Mun. More probes will touch down on the Mun to confirm the initial results.

If someone needs a banner I could make them one, but they should at least have their company name/ abbreviation in their sig.
